text: My name is Pedro, I am 20 years old and I live in Toledo, Paraná, Brazil. I hold a technical degree in IT from IFPR – Campus Assis Chateaubriand and I am in the final semester of the Systems Analysis and Development course at Biopark Educação. I intend to pursue a career as a Front-End Developer.

I am a web developer passionate about front-end solutions, with strong expertise in React and Tailwind. I use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create dynamic and responsive interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences. My goal is to turn ideas into efficient digital solutions that engage and inspire.

In addition to technical skills, I value problem-solving, teamwork, and clear communication, always striving for innovation and quality in every project. My objective is to develop functional and intuitive applications that make a difference.

title: Welcome
text: In this project, I used GSAP for the first time, exploring animations to enhance my front-end skills. Developed with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, I focused on performance, user experience, and accessibility, which motivated me to delve deeper into this field.

I developed the landing page for Anatonelly Tech, enhancing my skills with GSAP and exploring new techniques that raised the quality of the project. I used JavaScript, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, focusing on performance, responsiveness, and smooth animations to improve user experience.

At Anatonelly LLC, I used JavaScript with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, applying GSAP to create dynamic animations on the page. This project allowed me to further refine my front-end skills by exploring advanced animation techniques and performance optimization.

Experiences
text: My professional experience includes an internship as a front-end developer, where I worked with technologies like JSX and TSX using the Next.js framework, along with Tailwind CSS for styling. During this internship, I built a solid foundation in web development, improving my skills in creating efficient and responsive user interfaces. This opportunity also allowed me to collaborate closely with other developers, designers, and stakeholders, strengthening my communication and teamwork skills.

I worked on the development of full solutions with Laravel and Vue.js, covering everything from data modeling and queries on the backend to the frontend interface. Later, I focused on front-end development of a project using React and Tailwind CSS. More recently, I joined the team responsible for implementing the Siemens system in a malt factory of Agraria, contributing to the digitization and automation of processes.

I currently work as a software development intern at Consisa Sistemas, where I am responsible for handling and resolving tasks related to the maintenance and evolution of corporate systems. I work on both the frontend and backend, using AngularJS with Bootstrap for the interface and Java for business logic and API integration. This experience has significantly contributed to my technical growth, as well as enhanced my analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and collaboration with the development team.
